page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Of the people we asked to fill in a questionaire on employment, 80.6% were either in full or part time employment. Of those, 6.9% were self employed and 3.4% did seasonal work. These were mainly fairground people who come to the area during the winter months. 62% worked normal hours, 24% worked shifts and 14% worked nights, surprisingly only 28% said they were the only wage earner in their family. 90% get paid weekly. 28% had worked more than ten years in the same job. The same percentage had worked between five to ten years. 31% had been one to five years in the same job and only 14% had worked less than one year in their present occupation. 41% worked locally. 52% travelled two to ten miles and 7% travelled more than 10 miles. 29% of the unemployed had been on a retraining scheme.
